name: The Knights of the Apocalypse (DEMO)
description:
Hi fellow retro gamers!

Imagine a team of Super Sentai in a zombie apocalypse. In this game you will find a lot of adventure and fun.

The Game is still under development.

A small demo is available on the Google Play Store.

This project has sprites from the amazing MalibuDarby:

https://malibudarby.itch.io/

Soon we will bring more details and updates.

Also follow us on Instagram: 

https://www.instagram.com/theknightsoftheapocalyse/

See you soon.
